QuestData.Title: Meet Lieutenant Icehammer...
QuestData.Description: Do you see those vrykul buildings on the bluffs to the northeast? The vrykul call that place Nifflevar. It's where most of their harpoon attacks on our frigates originate.$B$BWell guess what? The time for payback has come, $n. I need you to take this harpoon control mechanism and meet up with Lieutenant Icehammer, who is hiding out in a vrykul building northwest of Nifflevar.$B$BWhen you're ready I'll place you on the back of one of our gryphons and zip you right to him!
QuestData.LogDescription: Guard Captain Zorek wants you to take the Harpoon Control Mechanism to Lieutenant Icehammer stationed outside of Nifflevar.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is this? Do I look like a babysitter?
QuestData.RewardText: <Lieutenant Icehammer takes the harpoon control mechanism from you.>$B$BAh, you come bearing gifts!
